idea:
• ABOUT NOVEAU
• Noveau is passionate about providing aesthetic & good quality products.
• Our products focus on driving efficiency and cost optimization.
• We have been importers for high quality, Innovative and futuristic products since 2003.
• In the last 17 years we have serviced over 2000 clients across industries.
• Noveau Manufacturing Private Limited, first of its kind manufacturing facility, was set up, in 2017 at Mumbai, INDIA.
• Our products are designed and developed in technical collaboration with our International partners.

• VISSION
• Noveau aims to provide high quality aesthetic products at an affordable price.
• Noveau to be a destination for innovative and futuristic products in the field of Safety & Sustenance.

• MISSION
• Exploit innovations in the field of safety and natural resource conservation.
• Introduce products which are high on aesthetics and are value for money.
• We aim to ensure wealth creation for all our stakeholders.

• VALUES
• Constantly developing & marketing innovative solutions in the field of Safety & Sustenance.
• Our products will focus on cost efficiency & productivity optimization.

• Connect, collaborate & grow the business with transparency & respect for all stake holders.


Cable Management Products - Cover all wires in few seconds just swipe 

Water Saving Products - Saves 84% Of Water Each Tap & Shower

Led Candle Products - For Safety of Fire
name: NOVEAU MANUFACTURING PRIVATE LIMITED
